`,(0,n.jsx)(e.p,{children:`To make it easier for users to use the checkbox, the checkbox label should also be clickable.
From accessibility perspective it is recommended to place checkboxes vertically to make it more obvious which label corresponds to which option.`}),`
`,(0,n.jsx)(e.h2,{id:"review",children:(0,n.jsx)(e.a,{className:"anchor",href:"#review",children:"Review"})}),`

`,(0,n.jsx)(e.li,{children:"Notes: Should most often only be used vertically"}),`

`,(0,n.jsx)(e.li,{children:"Contrast: good"}),`
